headline: Vertical Aerospace Selects Evolito as Electric Propulsion Unit Partner for Valo
summary: LONDON & NEW YORK, February 05, 2026--Vertical Aerospace ("Vertical" or "Company") [NYSE:EVTL], a global aerospace and technology company that is pioneering electric aviation, today announced a new long-term partnership with Evolito, a leader in high-performance electric propulsion systems, to supply electric propulsion units ("EPUs") - electric engines - that will power Valo, Vertical’s commercial eVTOL aircraft.

content.title: Vertical Aerospace Selects Evolito as Electric Propulsion Unit Partner for Valo
content.summary: LONDON & NEW YORK, February 05, 2026--Vertical Aerospace ("Vertical" or "Company") [NYSE:EVTL], a global aerospace and technology company that is pioneering electric aviation, today announced a new long-term partnership with Evolito, a leader in high-performance electric propulsion systems, to supply electric propulsion units ("EPUs") - electric engines - that will power Valo, Vertical’s commercial eVTOL aircraft.

thumbnail.caption: Vertical Aerospace selects Evolito as electric engine partner for Valo
